com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache

Interface Values.CachingEvent

  • Enclosing class:
    Values

    public static interface Values.CachingEvent
    Used when requesting a Values.CacheableValue or a Values.CachedMap for retrieving a business object, depending on the current workflow.
    Since:
    2010.09.09

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onIOStreamer(Cacher.Status status)
      Is invoked when the wrapped business object is bound to be retrieved from an Business.IOStreamer, i.e. from the persistence layer.
      void onUriStreamParser(Cacher.Status status)
      Is invoked when the wrapped business object is bound to be retrieved from an Business.UriStreamParser, i.e. not locally.

    • Method Detail
